question: Gynecologist visit and ghusal
answer:
QUESTION
Will the Ghusl be fard (compulsory)if my Gynacologist puts her fingers in my vigina. During my pregnancy visits my doctor is checking by puting her fingers in. Do I have to make Gusal after this to be pure again.
ANSWER


Share:
The internal check up by a gynacologist does not invalidate the ghusl. It
invalidates only the wudhu.

And Allah Ta'ala knows best

Mufti E. Desai
